record.Statements: HTML is what type of language ?
record.Options: A. Scripting Language @ B. Markup Language @ C. Programming Language @ D.Network Protocol

record.Statements: HTML uses
record.Options: A. User defined tags @ B. Pre-specified tags @ C. Fixed tags defined by the language @ D.Tags only for linking

record.Statements: The year in which HTML was first proposed _______.
Fundamental HTML Block is known as ___________.
record.Options: A. HTML Body @ B. HTML Tag @ C. HTML Attribute @ D.HTML Element

record.Statements: Apart from <b> tag, what other tag makes text bold ?
record.Options: A. <fat> @ B. <strong> @ C. <black> @ D. <emp>

record.Statements: What is the full form of HTML?
record.Options: A. HyperText Markup Language @ B. Hyper Teach Markup Language @ C. Hyper Tech Markup Language @ D. None of these

record.Statements: Who is Known as the father of World Wide Web (WWW)?
record.Options: A. Robert Cailliau @ B. Tim Thompson @ C. Charles Darwin @ D. Tim Berners-Lee

record.Statements: What should be the first tag in any HTML document?
record.Options: A. <head> @ B. <title> @ C. <html> @ D. <document>

record.Statements: How can you make a bulleted list with numbers?
record.Options: A. <dl> @ B. <ol> @ C. <list> @ D. <ul>

record.Statements: What tag is used to display a picture in a HTML page?
record.Options: A. picture @ B. image @ C. img @ D. src

record.Statements: HTML web pages can be read and rendered by _________.
record.Options: A. Compiler @ B. Server @ C. Web Browser @ D. Interpreter

record.Statements: Which of the following is not a browser ?
record.Options: A. Microsofts Bing @ B. Netscape Navigator @ C. Mozilla Firefox @ D. Opera

record.Statements: HTML tags are surrounded by which type of brackets.
record.Options: A. Curly @ B. Round @ C. Squart @ D. Angle

record.Statements: Awebpage displays a picture. What﻿﻿﻿ ﻿﻿tag ﻿﻿﻿﻿﻿was used to display that picture?
record.Options: A. picture @ B. image @ C.img @ D. src

record.Statements: Which tag inserts a line horizontally on your web page?
record.Options: A. <hr> @ B. <line> @ C. <line direction="horizontal"> @ D. <tr>

record.Statements: What should be the first tag in any HTML document?
record.Options: A. <head> @ B. <title> @ C. <html> @ D. <document>

record.Statements: Which tag allows you to add a row in a table?
record.Options: A. and @ B. and @ C. and @ D. and

record.Statements: How can you make a bulleted list?
record.Options: A. <list> @ B. <nl> @ C. <ul> @ D. <ol>

record.Statements: How can you make a numbered list?
record.Options: A. <dl> @ B. <ol> @ C. <list> @ D. <ul>

record.Statements: How can you make an e-mail link?
record.Options: A. <a href="xxx,yyy"> @ B. <mail href="xxx,yyy"> @ C. <mail>xxx,yyy<\mail> @ D. <a href="mailto:xxx,yyy">

record.Statements: What is the correct HTML for making a hyperlink?
record.Options: A. ICT Trends Quiz @ B. ICT Trends Quiz @ C. @ D. url="http://mcqsets.com">ICT Trends Quiz

record.Statements: Choose the correct HTML tag to make a text italic
record.Options: A. <ii> @ B. <italics> @ C. <italic> @ D. <i>

record.Statements: Choose the correct HTML tag to make a text bold?
record.Options: A. <b> @ B. <bold> @ C. <bb> @ D. <bld>

record.Statements: What is the correct HTML for adding a background color?
record.Options: A. <body color="yellow"> @ B. <body bgcolor="yellow"> @ C. <background>yellow</background> @ D. <body background="yellow">

record.Statements: Choose the correct HTML tag for the smallest size heading?
record.Options: A. <heading> @ B. <h6> @ C. <h1> @ D. <head>
